MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 and CW4 postcode areas of Congleton and Crewe, affecting properties in Congleton Road, Cross Lane, Forty Acre Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:20am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on 27th December 2020.
